message.content:
cs.CV, cs.IR, cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI. 

The paper deals with the problem of identifying text in images, which is a common task in computer vision (cs.CV). The proposed approach involves developing novel cues and a Bayesian method for their integration, which falls under the category of machine learning (cs.LG) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The paper also discusses the use of a Markov random field (MRF) model to exploit the dependencies between characters, which is a common technique in natural language processing (cs.CL). Finally, the paper evaluates its approach on benchmark datasets, which involves information retrieval (cs.IR).
